item.title: 首席财务官称华纳兄弟可能在分拆之前出售工作室股份
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., which is splitting itself in two, could sell a 20% stake in its studio and streaming business before the planned separation next year.】

item.title: Scale AI 起诉竞争对手初创公司 Mercor，指控其窃取商业机密
item.description: Scale AI 公司起诉竞争对手数据标签初创公司 Mercor，指控该公司和 Scale 的一名前员工窃取商业机密以吸引新业务。【原文：Scale AI Inc. sued rival data-labeling startup Mercor, accusing the firm and a former Scale employee of stealing trade secrets to attract new business.】

item.title: 美联储《米色报告》显示美国大部分地区经济增长甚微或没有增长
item.description: 美联储在《米色手册》（Beige Book）地区商业联系人调查报告中称，最近几周，美国大部分地区的经济活动 "几乎没有变化"。【原文：US economic activity saw “little or no change” across most of the country in recent weeks, the Federal Reserve said in its Beige Book survey of regional business contacts.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州州长敦促特朗普停止攻击风电场
item.description: 马萨诸塞州州长莫拉-希利（Maura Healey）敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统阻止政府停止海上风电开发的举动。【原文：Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey is urging President Donald Trump to stop the government’s moves to halt offshore wind developments.】

item.title: 沙特投资者在 26 亿美元肉类交易前出售 BRF 股票
item.description: 一位沙特阿拉伯投资者出售了巴西肉鸡公司（BRF SA）11%的股份，此举为这家巴西鸡肉生产商斥资 26 亿美元与牛肉巨头 Marfrig Global Foods SA 合并扫清了障碍。【原文：A Saudi Arabian investor has sold an 11% stake in BRF SA, a move that helps remove a hurdle for the Brazilian chicken producer’s $2.6 billion merger with beef giant Marfrig Global Foods SA.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击美联储点燃黄金多头危机赌注
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对美联储的攻击有可能引发通货膨胀、抑制投资并破坏人们对美国经济的信心。对于黄金多头来说，这是一个诱人的情景，它巩固了创纪录的涨势，使黄金成为今年最热门的资产之一。【原文：President Donald Trump’s assault on the Federal Reserve risks stoking inflation, curbing investment and undermining confidence in the US economy. For gold bulls, it’s a tantalizing scenario reinforcing a record-breaking rally that’s made the metal one of this year’s hottest assets.】

item.title: 布宜诺斯艾利斯市和圣达菲市考虑在选举期间出售债券
item.description: 布宜诺斯艾利斯市和阿根廷圣达菲省正在考虑在周日布宜诺斯艾利斯省级选举和 10 月中期选举之间的短暂时间内出售国际债券。【原文：The City of Buenos Aires and Argentina’s Santa Fe province are weighing international bond sales in the narrow window between Sunday’s provincial election in Buenos Aires and October midterms.】

item.title: NBC 称 NFL 广告库存已售出 90%，超级碗已预订一空
item.description: NBCUniversal 在即将到来的 NFL 赛季中的广告库存已售出 90%，2026 年超级碗的广告也已预订一空。【原文：NBCUniversal’s ad inventory for the upcoming NFL season is 90% sold out, with the 2026 Super Bowl already fully booked.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称，日本投资者面临收益率上升的 "巨变
item.description: 据加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）称，由于日本收益率不断上升，吸引国内投资者将资金停放在国内，而放弃持有国外资产，全球货币和利率市场正在经历一场巨变。【原文：Global currency and interest-rate markets are heading into a massive change as rising Japanese yields are luring domestic investors to park their money at home at the expense of holding foreign assets, according to RBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 首席执行官表示，Polymarket 已通过美国上市的监管障碍
item.description: 据Polymarket首席执行官Shayne Coplan称，基于加密货币的预测市场Polymarket已获得在美国推出所需的监管批准，在此之前，最高监管机构批准了该市场推出的另一个关键要素。【原文：Polymarket, the crypto-based prediction market, has the regulatory approvals needed to launch in the US after a top regulator granted it another critical component to launch, according to its chief executive officer, Shayne Coplan.】

item.title: 皮博迪预计特朗普时代美国煤炭需求将大幅增长
item.description: 据矿业巨头皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp. ）称，美国电力需求的增长有可能使煤炭消耗量增加多达 57%，这对多年来一直萎靡不振的煤炭行业来说将是一个重大转变。【原文：Swelling US demand for electricity has the potential to boost coal consumption as much as 57%, according to mining giant Peabody Energy Corp., in what would be a major shift for an industry that’s been waning for years.】

item.title: 印度小组批准从 9 月 22 日起降低消费税
item.description: 印度一个小组周三同意对国内大部分商品和服务征收双层消费税，并对奢侈品和 "罪恶商品 "征收更高税率。【原文：An India panel on Wednesday agreed to a two-slab consumption tax for most of the goods and services in the country and a higher levy on luxury and ‘sin goods.’】

item.title: 天然气交易员萨特比在维托尔工作三周后重新加入摩科瑞集团
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，顶级天然气交易商菲利普-萨特比（Philip Sutterby）在维托尔集团（Vitol Group）仅工作了几周后，将第三次重新加入摩科瑞能源贸易公司（Mercuria Energy Trading SA）。【原文：Top natural gas trader Philip Sutterby is rejoining Mercuria Energy Trading SA for a third stint after spending only a few weeks at Vitol Group, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普暗示如果关税被推翻，贸易协议将终止
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普暗示，如果他的全球关税最终被美国法院裁定为非法，那么他与欧盟、日本和韩国等经济体的贸易协定将被废除。【原文：President Donald Trump insinuated trade agreements with economies including the European Union, Japan and South Korea would be axed if his global tariffs are ultimately ruled illegal by the US court system.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气交易商抢购冬季价格翻三番的廉价赌注
item.description: 欧洲天然气交易商正以低廉的期权价格押注天然气价格将在年底前上涨两倍，这表明他们担心燃料供应在即将到来的冬季仍会更加紧张。【原文：European natural gas traders are picking up cheap options bets on prices tripling by the end of year, in a sign of concern that fuel supplies could still be tighter this coming winter.】

item.title: 巴宝莉将在缺席一年后重新加入英国蓝筹股基准市场
item.description: 巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）在失去英国蓝筹股标杆地位一年后，又重返英国股市精英行列。【原文：A year after losing its spot in Britain’s blue-chip benchmark, Burberry Group Plc is returning to the UK’s stock-market elite.】

item.title: 亚马逊因天价送货车维修费面临反弹
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）希望更新其老化的蓝色送货车队，但使用这些货车运送包裹的小企业表示，他们正被 2 万美元或更多的维修账单吓得不知所措，根本无力承担。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. wants to refresh its aging fleet of blue delivery vans, but the small businesses that use them to ferry packages say they’re getting blindsided by repair bills of $20,000 or more that they can ill afford.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦抨击特朗普美联储攻击的 "严重倒退
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）加入了全球政策制定者的行列，就白宫对美联储的攻击发出警报。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau joined a chorus of global policymakers sounding the alarm over White House attacks on the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 特朗普公司 54 亿美元数字硬币受市场动荡冲击
item.description: 特朗普公司大肆宣扬的加密货币进军— WLFI代币— 周一推出，雄心勃勃地要成为新数字生态系统的支柱。几个小时内，它就陷入了长期以来一直是加密货币交易标志的动荡和不稳定之中。【原文：Trump Inc.’s much-trumpeted crypto foray — the WLFI token — launched Monday with ambitions of serving as the backbone of a new digital ecosystem. Within hours, it was mired in the turbulence and instability that has long been the hallmarks of crypto trading.】

item.title: 卡尼在与特朗普进行 "极具建设性 "的通话后派遣特使前往华盛顿
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，在周一晚间与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行了 "非常有建设性 "的对话之后，加拿大和美国正在进行谈判，以解决受关税影响行业的问题。【原文：Mark Carney said Canada and the US are in negotiations to resolve issues in tariff-hit sectors after a “very constructive” conversation with President Donald Trump on Monday evening.】

item.title: 指证 Hwang 的前 Archegos 风险主管免于牢狱之灾
item.description: Archegos Capital Management 公司前首席风险官在华尔街沸沸扬扬的欺诈和市场操纵案庭审中指证创始人 Bill Hwang，从而避免了因其在公司崩溃中所扮演的角色而入狱。【原文：Archegos Capital Management’s former chief risk officer avoided prison for his role in the firm’s meltdown after testifying against founder Bill Hwang at a fraud and market manipulation trial that riveted Wall Street.】

item.title: 高盛和 KKR 是斯塔达 14 亿欧元 PIK 债务的贷款人之一
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）和 KKR & Co.是提供约 14 亿欧元最昂贵债务的贷款方之一，以支持 CapVest Partners 收购德国制药商 Stada Arzneimittel AG 的多数股权。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management and KKR & Co. are among lenders providing around €1.4 billion of one of the most expensive types of debt to back CapVest Partners’ acquisition of a majority stake in German drugmaker Stada Arzneimittel AG.】

item.title: Instagram 首次发布 iPad 应用程序，聚焦卷轴游戏
item.description: Instagram 首次推出专门的 iPad 应用程序，为其广受欢迎的移动应用程序提供重新设计的版本，旨在鼓励更多的视频消费。【原文：Instagram is launching a dedicated iPad app for the first time, offering a redesigned version of its popular mobile app that’s meant to encourage more video consumption.】

item.title: 英美资源集团将通过出售股权退出铂金分拆公司 Valterra
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在完成对其铂金开采部门的分拆后仅数月，就开始出售其在 Valterra Platinum Ltd. 剩余的约 20% 股份。【原文：Anglo American Plc is offering its remaining stake of about 20% in Valterra Platinum Ltd. just months after completing the demerger of its platinum mining arm.】

item.title: 阳狮集团首席执行官看好下半年业绩，公司业绩随之上升
item.description: 阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）首席执行官阿瑟-萨东（Arthur Sadoun）表示对下半年充满信心，公司股价升至五周以来的最高点，此前该公司曾警告广告业务可能放缓。【原文：Publicis Groupe SA shares rose to the highest in five weeks after Chief Executive Officer Arthur Sadoun expressed confidence in the second half of the year, after the company had previously warned of a potential advertising slowdown.】

item.title: 莫桑比克为 1.3 亿美元的国有航空公司救助计划设立 SPV
item.description: 莫桑比克内阁在一份声明中说，莫桑比克正在为一个国有企业集团创建一个特殊目的机构，以收购国家航空公司 LAM 的股份。【原文：Mozambique is creating a special-purpose vehicle for a group of state-owned companies to acquire shares in the national airline LAM, the cabinet said in a statement.】

item.title: M&G 股价在《金融时报》报道阿波罗研究交易后短暂飙升
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.该股很快抹去了涨幅。【原文：M&G Plc shares spiked as much as 8.6% on Wednesday after the Financial Times reported that Apollo Global Management Inc. considered a takeover bid for the London-listed money manager and life insurer. The shares quickly erased gains.】

item.title: 美国大豆种植条件减弱，降雨帮助大豆生长
item.description: 大豆期货周三触及近两周来的最低水平，因为降雨正在帮助美国干涸的田地。【原文：Soybean futures touched the lowest level in nearly two weeks Wednesday as rainfall was aiding parched US fields.】
